Well I agree with that to Yan, but there is already a rule against
destroying every missile, and its not accepting dammage. Also, I do
understand why you made the rule, and it is because people abused it.
But a lot of those people have quit, (albeit not all) The only reason I
said anything is because rAuq's reasons for the rule made no sense, and
I was trying to set him straight.
